name: The Tower (itch) (Orangefire Games)
description:
Story: 

    You are a robot named Reyson who has come across an ancient abandoned tower while on your travels. You decide to climb the tower, because... you can.

Gameplay Notes:
  • You can use WASD as well as the arrow keys
  • You can jump with W, ▲, or [SPACE]
  • Jump height is determined by the length of the button press
  • You can jump through the bottoms of moving platforms
Development Notes:

    My original idea involved unlocking a character after "climbing the tower", with each character having a unique ability to play with.  This would have given the player an objective goal to work towards, but as it stands the game is mostly just a test of skill. I hope it's fun enough as-is.
